name: Jo達o Luiz Vieira
summary: Senior Software Engineer and Tech Lead with 7+ years of experience specializing in full-cycle game development for web and emerging platforms. Expert in TypeScript, JavaScript, Unity, and cloud architecture, with a proven track record of shipping highly profitable titles, leading technical teams, and pioneering innovative AI-driven game creation tools. Adept at managing live operations and deploying scalable applications.

work.title: Senior Game Engineer & Tech Lead
bullets: Pioneered the development of an innovative game creator that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to transform user text prompts into playable, interactive visual novels.
Designed and deployed a scalable, serverless backend on AWS for the LLM creator, defining the infrastructure as code using AWS CDK with Lambda, CloudFront, S3, and AuroraDB (PostgreSQL).

Led a prototyping team (1 developer, 1 artist) to explore new game concepts for emerging platforms like Discord and Telegram; responsible for writing product specs, analyzing performance data, and deploying successful prototypes.

Delivered core features for the pet simulation game 'Buruburu Do-butsu', leading to a promotion to Tech Lead based on strong performance; assumed full ownership of the game's technical roadmap, architecture, and live operations.
Contributed to the development and live service of 'Thug Life', a highly profitable title on Facebook Instant Games, implementing key gameplay and monetization features to drive revenue.

work.title: Senior HTML5 Game Developer
bullets: Led development and live operations for a portfolio of HTML5 games, including key titles like Solitaire Stories Tripeaks and Mahjong Story, implementing features and optimizations to improve player retention.
Architected and implemented a unified build pipeline for multi-platform deployment (Android, iOS, Web), significantly reducing compilation time and streamlining the release process.
Mentored developers on best practices for TypeScript, Redux, and Pixi.js, improving overall team code quality and productivity.

work.title: Unity Game Developer
bullets: Developed a high-performance C++ tool to convert CAD models to optimized meshes in real-time, automating a critical step in the asset pipeline for VR applications in Unity.
Designed and built a custom Unity-like editor that empowered non-technical clients to create and customize their own VR training simulations, reducing dependency on the development team.
Implemented core multiplayer functionalities for a collaborative VR platform using C# and Unity, focusing on low-latency interactions and state synchronization.
